name: War World Tank II 1945
description:
You are an epic tank world war fury - real army panzer battle young defeater and fearless military commander of war action machines filled army tank battle in world war II

Tank-based military FPS game.

Join your battle with your tank.
Destroy the enemy tank with a precision aim.
You can upgrade your tank and make it stronger, faster, and more powerful.
FEATURES

Superior quality graphics.
Dynamical action, shooting.
Realistic physics applied.
Easy control
